scripts.automate:media: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli media get-buckets&&demo-cli media import&&demo-cli media get-assets
scripts.automate:serverless: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli repositories clone&&demo-cli serverless configure&&demo-cli serverless install&&demo-cli serverless deploy&&demo-cli serverless get-endpoints
scripts.automate:settings: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli content configure&&dc-cli settings import ./repositories/content/settings/settings.json --mapFile workflow-states-mapping.json&&demo-cli content get-workflow-states&&demo-cli content get-content-repositories
scripts.automate:schemas: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli content configure&&dc-cli content-type-schema import ./repositories/content/content-type-schemas&&dc-cli content-type import ./repositories/content/content-types --sync
scripts.automate:webhooks: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli content configure&&dc-cli webhooks import ./repositories/content/webhooks/webhooks.json
scripts.automate:extensions: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli content configure&&dc-cli extensions import ./repositories/content/extensions/extensions.json
scripts.automate:indexes: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli content configure&&dc-cli indexes import ./repositories/content/indexes/test-index.json&&dc-cli indexes import ./repositories/content/indexes/indexes.json&&demo-cli content get-search-api-key
scripts.automate:content: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli content configure&&dc-cli content-item import ./repositories/content/content-items --mapFile hub-mapping.json&&demo-cli content get-hierarchies
scripts.automate:content-with-republish: cd automation&&demo-cli configure&&demo-cli content configure&&dc-cli content-item import ./repositories/content/content-items --republish --mapFile hub-mapping.json&&demo-cli content get-hierarchies
scripts.automate:all: run-s automate:configure automate:media automate:extensions automate:schemas automate:content-with-republish automate:schemas
